member.name: M:MSA.Phase2.Weatherman.Controllers.WeathermanController.getWeather(System.String)
member.summary: This endpoint takes the name of a city, then returns the weather details from the database
member.response: Success, returns A JSON object describing the weather details

member.name: M:MSA.Phase2.Weatherman.Controllers.WeathermanController.getTempWarning(System.String)
member.summary: This endpoint takes the name of a city, generates then returns the temperature warnings as a string
member.response: Success, retuns String of temperature warning description

member.name: M:MSA.Phase2.Weatherman.Controllers.WeathermanController.getWeatherWarniing(System.String)
member.summary: This endpoint takes the name of a city, generates then returns the weather warnings as a string
member.response: Success, returns String of weather warning description

member.name: M:MSA.Phase2.Weatherman.Controllers.WeathermanController.addWeather(System.String)
member.summary: This endpoint takes the name of a city, then adds the weather details to the database
member.response: Weather information successfully created in database

member.name: M:MSA.Phase2.Weatherman.Controllers.WeathermanController.UpdateWeather(System.String)
member.summary: This endpoint takes the name of a city, then updates or adds the weather details in the database
member.response: Weather information successfully updated in database
Weather information successfully created in database

member.name: M:MSA.Phase2.Weatherman.Controllers.WeathermanController.deleteWeather(System.String)
member.summary: This endpoint takes the name of a city, and deletes the weather details in the database
